body.name: DweIke Fluffy Area Rug for Living Room Bedroom, 4'x6' Soft Modern Indoor Plush Dark Green Rugs, Non-Slip High Pile Shaggy Carpets for Girls Kids Bedroom, Fluffy Faux Fur Rugs for Bedroom Home Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 43 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: New Color Design: DweIke rugs color design was done after customer preference survey. According to the results of most people's choice, the carpets in the new color feels warmer and more comfortable.

Shaggy Area Rugs: The fluffy rug is made of three-layer material: synthetic microfiber on the top, thick sponge in the middle, and non-woven fabric on the back, which is makes bedroom rug softer and more comfortable.

Non-slip Bottom :The bottom of the rectangular carpet is covered with many high-density non-slip points, which help increase friction with the floor and prevent sliding.So it is very suitable for children to use in bedroom, living room, kids room.

Cute Home Decor:Colorful and fluffy soft rugs are suitable for many occasions, such as living room, bedroom, children's room and nursery. This lovely rug is made from a safe velvet material, so it's perfect for kids' and girls' rooms.

Easy to Clean：Usually only need to use a vacuum cleaner for simple cleaning.For a deeper clean, wipe with a damp cloth.The rug pack with a vacuum bag, the thickness will recover within two days, please don't worry.
body.description: New carpet color design: more comfortable. 1. After investigating customers' preference for carpet colors, our carpets have been improved and launched a more comfortable color series. 2. According to the results of most people's choices, the improved carpet color provides people with a warmer and more comfortable feeling Comfortable throughout the year: Fluffy carpet suitable for winter and summer 1. Our carpet is made of superfine fiber, so it is very soft and fluffy. In summer, carpets can be used in air-conditioned rooms, and in winter, carpets can be used on the floor. Warm in winter and cool in summer, , very suitable for use in the living room and bedroom. 2. Bright colors make it very suitable for any room, such as living room, bedroom, room, dining room or people gathering space, children's room and game room, or bedroom, study and other private rooms. Create a more comfortable home environment. Anti-slip design carpet 1. There are high-density non-slip points on the back of the carpet to prevent slippage. 2. This shape greatly increases the friction between the carpet and the floor. 3. So this kind of non-slip carpet is especially suitable for families with children and pets 4. In addition, the back is non-woven fabric, which will not damage the floor of the room. Super soft and fluffy velvet material carpet 1. This soft and fluffy shag carpet is made of velvet, and the texture is silky smooth 2. Made of safe materials, very friendly to pets and children's skin Machine washable carpet, convenient to keep the carpet clean. This is a kind of carpet that can be washed in a washing machine at home. *Please use a laundry bag with mesh to wash in the washing machine. Dust-proof vacuum packaging design 1. The carpet is packed in a vacuum bag . 2. After unpacking our carpet, the wrinkles on the carpet disappear quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Softness
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for the price. It is a great quality and I love that it comes with different colours. I used it for my study space but it can be used for multiple purposes. It’s pretty soft and feels great to walk on. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievably soft and silky!
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect small rug to go next to the bed for your cold toes in the morning. It’s very soft and smooth and feels great on the feet. The only slight drawback is that it’s not thicker, so it doesn’t provide any padding to the hard floor underneath but I suppose you could always get a small rug pad. The color is a deep dark blue which is exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and cute!
reviews.reviewText: When I got the package I was worried, because it was vacuum sealed and seemed so small and hard to see the quality before opening. But I love it, it looks great! It's super soft, doesn't look too thin like some cheap shag rugs, and it doesn't slip at all. The only issue is that it's so soft it's slippery; not so much that I can't walk on it, but I think I would not recommend it for households with elderly people just in case. Color was true to pictures, and I haven't cleaned it yet but it does seem to be machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptic turned lover (for now)
reviews.reviewText: I’ll start out by saying I was a total skeptic when this arrived in the mail, mostly because it arrived as a tiny vacuum sealed square and I was expecting an actual hard back rug coming in a roll.Smell: After opening it up it does have a slight smell as others mention. It smells like when you get a fresh memory foam mattress. It’s not horrible, definitely better than some real rugs I’ve gotten but the smell is there though I expect it to dissipate.Slippery: okay others had mentioned it was slippery and I can kind of see it, it’s a slick fur and my kids already mentioned how cool it is to just slide across it. It’s not unsafe walking on it like ice but I can see where this slippery comment came from. Furniture may not stay put on it because of this.Backing: it has a nonslip backing which isn’t very grippy like say trampoline or non slip socks, I have stuff on top of the rug so this isn’t a big deal but it is nice that the rug is slightly thick and padded. This was purchased for a kids room to look like grass so they are loving the softness to just chill on the floor.Cozy: brings a cozy vibe to the roomDurability: TBD, will need to see how this holds up long term and vacuuming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never really leave reviews but I just HAD to leave one for this rug. I got a 4x6 rug and it is actual size. I know nothing about length and thought it would be small but for the people like me it is longer than the ridge of my queen size bed. The quality of this rig is golden it is SUPER soft and vibrant, the way this producer was shipped with care which is another reason why I recommend this rug to my other friends that are thinking of redecorate their rooms. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent product with some drawbacks
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the DweIke Super Soft Shaggy Rug in the Deep-Green color, and I have mixed feelings about it. Let's start with the positives: I absolutely love the vibrant green color, which adds a lively touch to my living room. Additionally, the rug is incredibly soft and comfortable to walk on, providing a cozy and inviting feel to the space.However, there are a couple of aspects that left me somewhat disappointed. Firstly, the rug gives off a strong and unpleasant odor during the first few weeks. It took some time for the smell to dissipate, which was quite bothersome. While it eventually faded away, it was not the most pleasant experience in the beginning.Secondly, I couldn't help but notice that the rug feels somewhat cheaply made. The materials used seem to lack durability, and I worry about its long-term longevity. It doesn't have the same sturdy and well-crafted feel as other rugs I've owned in the past.That being said, I must emphasize that the DweIke Shaggy Rug does serve its purpose in terms of adding a pop of color and a soft texture to my room. It's not a high-end or luxury option, but it does provide a decent level of comfort and aesthetics for the price point.In conclusion, if you're looking for an affordable rug that adds a splash of color and coziness to your living space, the DweIke Super Soft Shaggy Rug could be a suitable choice. Just be prepared for the initial odor and keep in mind that it may not have the same durability as higher-end options. It's a decent option for those on a budget, but if you're seeking long-term quality, you may want to explore other alternatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and soft
reviews.reviewText: I actually didn’t love this at first because it looks weird when you first open it up. But after a couple of days it flattened out so nicely and it actually has a nice thickness to it considering it has no hard backing underneath. Looks so pretty in baby’s room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug! I put it in my guess room. It feels amazing on the feet! I gave it 4 stars because it has like raised up sections, I guess for character, but you have to be careful how you walk, because you will trip. It comes in a vacuum sealer bag. I would definitely recommend this rug. Thank you seller!
Really great quality, non slip and so soft! Love the color, exactly as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great item. Value for money. Would be better if it was a little thicker.
Sincerely loves this carpet. Choosing the right colour that match my new arrival the Arabian style low sofa set. Carpet good quality product, nice and neat packaging. Thank you Mr Seller 😁
Happy with my purchase everything was well I had expected. Money worth. No issues no complain whatsoever. Thank you seller
